title: Broccoli and cauliflower cheese soup
ingredients: ['250 g (9 oz) broccoli, broken into florets', '250 g (9 oz) cauliflower, broken into florets', '1 shallot, or 50 g (1¾ oz) onions, chopped', '600 ml (1 pint) vegetable stock', '300 ml (10 fl oz) skimmed milk', '40 g (1½ oz) tiny pasta shapes for soup', '75 g (2¾ oz) half-fat mature Cheddar cheese, grated', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', 'Salt and black pepper', 'To garnish: a pinch of grated nutmeg']
